Sometimes this same error occurs in the 'Initializing Java tooling' job. It may be related to other errors to do with the Subclipse plug-in from Tigris, but it seems it's just a null message given to a Status object. I will include the Subclipse-related exception, in case it's of any help.

Fixed.  thanks for reporting.

We should check the e.getMessage() does not return null before attempting to log.
